## Source: ossf-package-analysis (14d5e86444b47f8ee729dcf7930f4ba68d938ea99b786e110e5d7bd53f081fa9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'scikit-learn-matplotlib' @ 6.12.17 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
